talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You look more tired than usual. Is there anything bothering you? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Elder$
Phew… (He looks exhausted)
Ah, {user_nick}.

$Elf Elder$
I'm fine... But I'm worried about Citridel.
Something might really happen to her if she continues to work like that. I tell her to take a break but she wouldn't listen. I can't force her to stay at home... I'm at a loss of what to do.

$Elf Elder$
What I could think of was to keep her distracted by giving her an interesting book that's at least a few thousand pages long. Then she might stay at home to finish the book.

$Elf Elder$
But I don't know where I can find such books...
I heard from Merchant Farrah that there are many books at the Passage of Broken Recollections.

$Elf Elder$
Oh, do you know about that place? Then could you do me a favour and find out where I can find such a book? It would be too heavy for you to bring it back alone so you can just tell me where it is.
<html>$Little Flower of Telesia$</html>

$Elf Elder$
It's Passage of Broken Recollections. Thank you.

${user_nick}$
(This place sure has a dizzying number of books. I need to find a thick and huge book... Oh there's one. It looks like it's thick enough to be a murder weapon.)

${user_nick}$
(I should check what the book is about first. I can't give Citridel an encyclopedia to read...)

${user_nick}$
(Wait a minute, this name...)

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
"Weak from fruit, cursed from birth" are words that I hate to hear.
Words that always follow me around like a nightmare... I wanted to run away from them in whatever way I could.

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
I dare say I'm the strongest Elf around, who is at the peak that no one has ever achieved.
No Elf can stand against me.

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
But... my empty heart couldn't be filled... Even though I had the strength that stood unchallenged, and the weakness that anyone would sympathise... The cold scornful eyes always gnawed at my soul.

$Novice Archer$
Is that Meriendel? The one who rose to be the top archer even when she was born blind and weak? She doesn't look that great at all.

$Novice Archer$
Hush! She must have an excellent sense of hearing too. By the way, what's so good about being a top archer? She won't ever know how beautiful Anu Arendel is...

$Palace Soldier$
A blind Elf? How can such a person be the strongest? Aren't all Elves weak?

$Palace Soldier$
How can a blind girl shoot arrows so accurately? She even reads books. It must be a lie to attract attention and pity...

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
…Though I could't see, I knew what existed around me.
I knew who's my enemy and who's my friend. I could feel the wind and… my senses seemed to be more developed than ordinary Elves.

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
…Maybe that's why I became more engrossed in becoming stronger. Now please stop saying those things, please...

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
It's my Telesia that I got this name and this body. As long as I'm an Elf, I can't go against my Telesia. But... sometimes I resent the Goddess for giving me this Telesia...

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
Well, the Queen was the only one who was on my side. She cared a lot about me but... sometimes I wondered if her care was towards me or my strength...

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
Honestly, I thought maybe it would be better for me if I died when I fought Feder... But... Haha. I had such a good time exchanging blows with him.

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
…Besides, it looks like an unworthy person like me is receiving the love of that man, I mean that dragon...
I even spilled the secret about my name and my past to him unknowingly...

$Archer Meriendel's Diary$
Honestly, he's too good to be true. He's good in everything, and he's so well mannered that he makes you question whether he is really corrupted. He said he studied many things because he was bored, but if everyone in the world did that, everyone would be geniuses. There was this incident... (Meriendel starts to talk about the past)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_01.ogg}
Ah... I just remembered something. Elizabeth talked about pretty clothes last time.
Meriendel, don't you have any pretty dresses?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_01.ogg}
Pretty dresses??? I'm a fighter so I don't need such things...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_02.ogg}
But don't you girls usually choose clothes over food?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_02.ogg}
Food for me.(Meriendel says firmly). I can't fight if I don't eat.
Of course, it's not because I have no money, I do. It's just that I'd rather buy weapons than splurge on clothes. My money is usually spent on weapon and food...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_03.ogg}
Hmm... sometimes you really say something outside what I learnt about the common behaviours humans. Is it because you're an Elf?
Then how about I buy you some clothes?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_03.ogg}
What? Erm... It's okay... Didn't you use up all your money on the repairs too? You had to pay a compensation for the mountains you blew up and the relics that were destroyed...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_04.ogg}
(He looks embarrassed) But I'm bothered that you keep wearing the same clothes to the ball or the parties. That's why people think you're a cold-blooded war-loving Elf, or that you're the ultimate weapon of the Elves.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_04.ogg}
Wow I didn't know about that...
Ultimate weapon sounds cool...
Does it mean that I'm the ultimate one who's better than everyone else?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_05.ogg}
(Rubinart bursts into a laughter) It's not something you should be happy about. I really don't understand you. Anyway, it's Feder and Elizabeth's wedding this time so groom yourself a little. I'm sure you'll look stunning when you... when you do that...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_05.ogg}
Huh…?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_06.ogg}
Whatever. Let's go to a shop now if you've made up your mind. You need to go there yourself to get the perfect size... Hey don't make that face. Now come on! I have enough money to buy you a dress! As for your hair... I guess I can do something about it.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_06.ogg}
...??? Huh? Rubinart, why hurry...?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_07.ogg}
These things need to get done once you put your mind to it, or else you'll keep pushing it back.
Come with me, Meriendel.

$Meriendel's Diary$
Huhuhu... That's how I ended up going on a date with Feder. Actually it was only after a long time that I realised that it was something called "a date". I couldn't see what kind of dress I was putting on, but... I could sense that it was something glamorous and elegant.

$Meriendel's Diary$
…It was the first time someone bought me a gift, so that made my heart flutter a little...
Rubinart could have been very popular if he wanted to, but it seemed like he wasn't interested in such things.

$Meriendel's Diary$
I was still in my pathetic one-sided love, yet he waited for me until the end... He's such a sweet man, I mean a sweet dragon. He always joked that he's corrupted but... to his friends he was forever kind and loyal...

$Meriendel's Diary$
When he was doing my hair at the palace, I asked him.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_07.ogg}
Rubinart, if you know all the secrets about this world... Don't you find it dull sometimes? Or don't you hate the world sometimes for making you a corrupted dragon?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_08.ogg}
Hmm? I'm irritated at times but I never thought the world itself was dull. Even though I don't like certain aspects of it... I have friends like you guys now so I don't feel that way. How about you, Meriendel?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_08.ogg}
I...
(Meriendel thinks for a while before continuing to speak)
That's right. I feel the same way as you. My life was tough at first, but...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_09.ogg}
Right now, I'm so happy that I wish this happiness would last forever.
All the pain I went through must have led to this day... Then I can't hate the world for giving me such a fate.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_10.ogg}
If I can travel back in time, I want to tell my young self that the happy days I dream about will surely come so don't be sad... Maybe I should tell her to collect the relics of ancient Elves that you like too.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_09.ogg}
W-well... I have you with me now so you can look for them when you're free...
We're done. Your hair isn't long so I just added some ornaments ornaments. Hmm... You look prettier than the princess! What do you think?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4655_qu_11.ogg}
Erm, I...

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4655_qu_01.ogg}
Oh my goodness, Meriendel! You look amazing!
This Asian style dress looks great on you! Your hair is so neatly done with those sparkling ornaments... wow, is that jade? You look so beautiful!
(Elizabeth bursts into the room and continues praising Meriendel)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_10.ogg}
Hey, a princess should have some manners!!
You should knock before you enter!!!

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4655_qu_02.ogg}
How can a princess stay still when she hears that someone is prettier than a princess?
But seriously, she really is beautiful. Hmph, Feder and I should be the main characters of the event. It looks like Meriendel will steal our limelight now.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_11.ogg}
You can ask Feder to buy you a pretty dress too if you're jealous.
Isn't that right, Feder? (Rubinart mutters to Feder who has followed behind Elizabeth into the room)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_4655_qu_01.ogg}
...Don't worry, Elizabeth.
I have prepared a beautiful dress for you too.
(Feder chides Elizabeth)

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4655_qu_03.ogg}
...I'll look forward to it then.
Seriously Meriendel, you should wear something like this more often. By the way, Rubinart, you're good in these things too. I think I understand why the ladies in the palace keep talking about you now.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4655_qu_12.ogg}
Well that's because I get along with humans well and I have many friends in the palace. It's not hard for me to talk to humans. I practised whenever I felt bored. Live long like me if you're jealous.

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4655_qu_04.ogg}
No, I didn't mean that!
Hehe... (Elizabeth is smiling naughtily but not many in the room understood the meaning of her smile)

$Meriendel's Diary$
Haha, it was fun. Though I couldn't see myself, it was the first time I was praised about my beauty so it made be a little surprised... He must have made me the most beautiful woman in the world. I could feel it even if I couldn't see. It's just that...

$Meriendel's Diary$
I wish I could see his happy face too...

$Meriendel's Diary$
Now all I need to do is to let go of this clumsy feeling... Why can't I do that...? If I can, I would be able to return his love... My body's not the only thing that needed to become stronger. My mind and my heart needed to be stronger too... I don't like myself being so pathetic...

${user_nick}$
(I only read the middle part but… Meriendel was the one who wrote this… The pages at the back are filled with the stories about the Ancients that she heard from Rubinart… Hmm, Citridel should be pleased with this)

${user_nick}$
(You have finished your mission. Go and let Elf Elder know.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Tell him about the book you saw at the Passage of Broken Recollections.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Elder$
You're back. Did you find an interesting book?

$Elf Elder$
Meriendel's diary?
Hmm I see. It would be enough to make Citridel interested. But...
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Elf Elder$
The rangers are a little busy at the moment so... it will be delivered a little later than I expected...

$Elf Elder$
I only hope that she'll stay healthy until the book arrives.
Taking care of one's own health is a necessary skill of a working Elf too.
Basha seemed worried about Citridel too.....
(Elf Elder seems genuinely concerned about Citridel. Hope for the best for Citridel...)

journal.title: Little Flower of Telesia 1
journal.contents:
It looks like Elf Elder wants Citridel to take a break but doesn't know how he can make her do that.
First, go to the Passage of Broken Recollections to find a book that might catch Citridel's attention.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Bookcase)
journal.destination: Find the book at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Find the book at the Passage of Broken Recollections.

journal.title: Little Flower of Telesia 2
journal.contents:
The story was about Meriendel and Rubinart.
The book is thick enough so let Elf Elder know about the book.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.destination: Let Elf Elder know about the information
journal.todo_msg: Let Elf Elder know about the book.
